frontmatter.title: Coaching: You Can't Learn Regular Expressions from Only Positive Examples
frontmatter.description: We need to make mistakes in order to learn, just like we need negative examples to train models in Computer Science. Why creating a safe environment for mistakes is crucial for genuine learning and development.
